properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-tel}యెహోవాను స్తుతించుట మంచిది మహోన్నతుడా నీ నామమును సంకీర్తనము చేయుట మంచిది{/lang-tel}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Udayamu naandu nee krupanu Prati raatrilo nee viswaasyatanu Yehovaa ninnu goorchi Prachurinchuta manchidi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Padi tantulu gala swaramandalamun Gambheera dhwani gala sitaaralanu Vaayinchi ninnu goorchi Prachurinchuta manchidi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Endu kanagaa Yehovaa nee kaaryamu Cheta neevu nannu santosha parachu Chunnaavu nee cheti panulanu batti Ne nutsaahinchu chunnanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa nee kaaryamulentha Manchivi nee yaalochna lathi Gambheeramulu pashupraayulu Avivekulu vivechimparu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nitya naashanamu nondutake gadaa Bhakhtiheenulu gaddi vale Chigurchuduru chedu kaaryamulanu Cheyu vaaru pushpinturu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahonnathuduvu gaa nityamundu Yehovaa nee shatruvu lehovaa Nashiyinchedaru chedu panulanu Cheyu vaarandaru chedipoduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neethi mantulu thamaala Vrukshamu vale naata badina vaarai Yehovaa mandiramulo eduguchu Muvvu vesi vardhilluchu nundedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naaku aashraya maina Yehovaa Yadhaardhudu cheduguleni vaadani Prasidhi cheyutaku saaramu kaligi Pachchaga nunduru vruddhulu{/lang-eng}
